body.name: Wireless Switch Pro Controller for Nintendo Switch/Lite/OLED, Bluetooth Gaming Controller for iPhone/Android/Phone/PC/Steam/Mac/iOS/iPad/TV with Programmable/Vibration/Motion Control/Turbo/Wakeup/RGB
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 26 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 11 mins
features: 【Wide Compatibility】The Wireless Switch Controller is compatible with Nintendo Switch/Lite/OLED, Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac, TV with iOS/MacOS 13.4 or later, support Apple Arcade MFi Games), Android devices (mobile phone, tablet, Android TVs and TV boxes with version 6.0 or later), PC/Laptop (Windows 7 8 9 10 11) and also supports most cloud games (Xbox game pass, Steam). *One-year limited warranty.

【Fast Bluetooth or Wired Connection】The Nintendo Switch Controller can be easily paired with Switch, mobile phone(iOS/Android), Mac, tablet, PC or TV (Android/Apple/Fire Stick) with a built-in Bluetooth via Bluetooth connection. Also, the Wireless Controller can be directly connected to a PC via a USB-C cable.

【Programmable & Remap ABXY 】 The Bluetooth gaming controller features 2 programmable buttons that can map A/B/X/Y/L/R/ZL/ZR/Left Joystick/Right Joystick/D-pad/+/- to AR/AL and record up to 30 seconds of the gaming operation, which makes it even easier to duplicate items in Zelda Tears of the Kingdom game. The phone controller has ABXY function switching that lets you freely switch between the Nintendo Switch layout and Xbox layout without removing the buttons.

【Adjustable Vibration & Turbo】The Nintendo Pro Controller comes with asymmetric dual motors that provide 4 adjustable vibration intensities (100%/70%/50%/0%), giving you the best immersive gaming experience. The Android Controller with auto and manual turbo, providing 3 adjustable turbo speeds (5/10/15 shots/s), instantly helping you enjoy the game to the fullest.

【Motion Controls & Cool RGB Light】With the 6-axis gyro sensor, this Game Controller allows you to use the motion controls to aim or do other movements when you are playing games on a Switch, mobile phone, PC, or even on TV. Also, the iPhone game controller is designed with 7 color LED lights around the joysticks, bringing great visual enjoyment for you.

【Wake-Up & Screenshot】 The phone gaming controller with One-key wake-up functions, you can wake up your Nintendo Switch within 1 second when it's in sleep mode. The Nintendo Switch controllers have a dedicated screenshot button to capture screenshots, which it's a great way to share some of your favorite in-game memories.

【Ergonomic Design& Long Battery Life】The Mobile Phone Controller is made of high-quality ABS material and features with non-slip texture on the grip and curved matted shell, which increases comfort and easier to grip. The Bluetooth Controller with a built-in 800 mAh rechargeable battery for up to 15-20 hours of gameplay, while only takes 2-3 hours to fully charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and High Quality
reviews.reviewText: I'm thrilled with my versatile Bluetooth game controller! Its ability to seamlessly connect to a variety of devices is a game-changer. Whether I'm gaming on my console, PC, or even my smartphone, this controller delivers a flawless connection every time. The ease of use and universal compatibility make it incredibly convenient, allowing me to switch between devices effortlessly.Not only does it connect seamlessly, but the performance is also outstanding. The controller's responsiveness and precision elevate my gaming experience to a whole new level. The button layout feels intuitive, and the ergonomic design ensures comfort during extended gaming sessions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for every console I've paired it to!
reviews.reviewText: It may take a few minutes to get acquainted with the instructions, but otherwise this controller is a breeze! The vibrant lighting options add for a really great look, the vibration functions as predicted, and it has a pretty reasonable battery life! I haven't experienced any lag or connection disruptions. Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The L and R buttons stopped working after 3 months
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this controller. I was able to connect it to both my Mac and to my Switch. Unfortunately, after three months the L and R (shoulder buttons) just stopped working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Bought it to use on my new Samsung Galaxy Book Pro with windows 11. The blue tooth paired with no issues at all and configuration was simple enough. Good little controller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and durable.
reviews.reviewText: Super great quality controller. Overall feels very durable compared to other controllers. The buttons click in which is great for any kind of game that reqiures fast reaction time. The controller also charges by USBC and chrages quite fast which is super nice. Almost no wireless button delay unlike most other wireless controllers. The undersides of the joysticks light up too which is a cool feature. The handles have good grips on them too so it's accidently drop it. The handles also have nice back buttons that you can bind in game for extra use. Overall a good quality and reliable controller that will hold up for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying the controller is EXCELLENT, it has beautiful LED Lights, the back buttons work perfectly. The only problem i have with the controller is the instructions, it doesnt really tell me anything, im still trying to figure out whats the LED setting, someone tell me how i change the LEDs please.anyways its good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good controller
reviews.reviewText: Controller works very well and is comparable to the switch pro controller but half the price and more additional features. Ability to switch a/b and x/y buttons easily is a great feature especially when using it on pc. Connects to pc with Bluetooth and has no issues was able to game comfortably and easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Started out good, then stopped working…
reviews.reviewText: Bought this controller 6 weeks ago. It worked well for 4 weeks, then the buttons stopped responding. Not good.
